commentaries.commentary: Sweden on the attack! Long pass out wide, and a precise cross comes into the D area.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Zlatan Ibrahimović! Unbelievable bicycle kick! Over Joe Hart! Simply sensational! Sweden's fourth goal!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: He rips off his shirt in jubilation! What a moment for Zlatan Ibrahimović! The graphic confirms it, what a scorer. Truly unforgettable.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: You won't see many goals better than that, ever. Absolutely astonishing technique and audacity from Zlatan! That will be replayed for years and talked about!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Sweden 4, England 2! Zlatan Ibrahimović is shirtless, celebrating! Jansson, Sana, Bensson join in! The stadium erupts, what an atmosphere!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: Look at this replay! Zlatan Ibrahimović! A bicycle kick from 25 yards! Over the keeper! Absolutely phenomenal technique and audacity!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Another angle! Zlatan Ibrahimović's overhead kick! Back to goal, 30 yards! Keeper no chance! This will be replayed for years to come!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: GOAL! It's in the back of the net! A fantastic strike leaves Joe Hart with absolutely no chance. The crowd is on its feet!
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1

commentaries.commentary: What an incredible moment! Power and precision were world class. Joe Hart tried his best, but that was simply unstoppable.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_2

commentaries.commentary: Tom Huddleston and Player #5 watch as the celebrations begin! This is going to be a massive lift for the team.
commentaries.speaker: COMMENTATOR_1
